mapper.select: SELECT fap.product_name, fap.farm_name, fap.farm_address, ph.amount, Date(ph.update_date) AS update_date FROM point_history ph JOIN farm_and_product fap ON ph.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num WHERE ph.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} ORDER BY ph.update_date

SELECT fap.product_name, fap.farm_name, ph.amount, ph.history_content, Date(ph.update_date) AS update_date FROM point_history ph LEFT OUTER JOIN farm_and_product fap ON ph.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num WHERE ph.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} ORDER BY ph.update_date

SELECT fap.product_name, fap.farm_name, ph.amount, ph.history_content, DATE(ph.update_date) AS update_date FROM point_history ph LEFT OUTER JOIN farm_and_product fap ON ph.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num WHERE ph.user_serial_num = #{user_serial_num} AND DATE(ph.update_date) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY ph.update_date
